CustomField.description: Enter PO # issued by client. Not all Opps require a PO # and they are typically used more frequently by larger companies. PO # Field integrates and displays on Pandadoc Estimates/Invoices as well as on auto-generated QB Invoices Associated PO $ Amount, add info into 'Notes - Accounting' field in Additional Info section
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter PO # issued by client. Not all Opps require a PO # and they are typically used more frequently by larger companies. PO # Field integrates and displays on Pandadoc Estimates/Invoices as well as on auto-generated QB Invoices Associated PO $ Amount, add info into 'Notes - Accounting' field in Additional Info section
CustomField.label: Invoice - PO #
